1370: Firiin moved to Koe straet.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Remsindis at age 24 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Remsindis, Suam, at age 26.
1373: Had a son with Remsindis, Brun, at age 27.
1375: Had a son with Remsindis, Lucas, at age 29.
Lost son Brun when Brun was 3 years old.
1376: Had a son with Remsindis, Mewekinus, at age 30.
1377: Lost his wife Remsindis while she was giving birth to Riquardus in 1377.
Became caretaker of Suam, Lucas, Mewekinus, Riquardus at age 32.
1390: Lost son Lucas when Lucas was 16 years old.
